member.name: M:Disc.Close
member.summary: Closes the Wii ISO True if the ISO was successfully closed. Otherwise false

member.name: M:Disc.Open
member.summary: Opens the Wii ISO True if the ISO was successfully opened. Otherwise false

member.name: M:Disc.Dispose
member.summary: Destructor. Disposes of the Disc object

member.name: M:Disc.#ctor(System.SByte!System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsSignUnspecifiedByte*)
member.summary: Constructor. Creates a Disc object The path of the Wii ISO file that the Disc object will access

member.name: T:Disc
member.summary: Represents a Wii disc image (ISO) and contains most of the methods for working with the image
